title: Sample News Content
description: It was the love of his Masters that transformed Santhi and it is the same love that he emanates in his teachings today which enables one to look into one’s own nature and fully transform. When Santhi speaks, it reaches one’s soul and not mind. It will empower you to fully feel, understand and realize the true power of your own self and love - the actual essence of yoga.
